sections.heading: court; rules of evidence; procedure; informal dispute resolution; procedure
sections.text: (1) The Nebraska Workers' Compensation Court shall not be bound by the usual common-law or statutory rules of evidence or by any technical or formal rules of procedure, other than as herein provided, but may make the investi

sections.heading: 48-129 and 48-168, R.R.S.1943, give the Workmen's Compensation Court jurisdiction to consider the issue of joint employment
sections.text: White v. Western Commodities, Inc., 207 Neb. 75, 295 N.W.2d 704 (1980).
